name: We, The Christmas Spirit
description:
Once a year, three ghosts representing the Christmases past, present, and yet to come will visit a rich businessman who has lost their festive spirit. 

One fateful year, the ghosts were defeated. The man was unpersuaded.

Instead, he believed it was the ghosts who had lost their festive spirit, unable to comprehend the present Christmas.

Confused, the Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come delays returning home. They have decided to spend some time in the Christmas Present.
